verses.verse: Say <WH559> ye unto your brethren <WH251>, Ammi <WH5971>; and to your sisters <WH269>, Ru-hamah <WH7355>.

Plead <WH7378> with your mother <WH517>, plead <WH7378>: for she is not my wife <WH802>, neither am I her husband <WH376>: let her therefore put away <WH5493> her whoredoms <WH2183> out of her sight <WH6440>, and her adulteries <WH5005> from between her breasts <WH7699>;

Lest I strip <WH6584> her naked <WH6174>, and set <WH3322> her as in the day <WH3117> that she was born <WH3205>, and make <WH7760> her as a wilderness <WH4057>, and set <WH7896> her like a dry <WH6723> land <WH776>, and slay <WH4191> her with thirst <WH6772>.
And I will not have mercy <WH7355> upon her children <WH1121>; for they be the children <WH1121> of whoredoms <WH2183>.

For their mother <WH517> hath played the harlot <WH2181>: she that conceived <WH2029> them hath done shamefully <WH3001>: for she said <WH559>, I will go <WH3212> after <WH310> my lovers <WH157>, that give <WH5414> me my bread <WH3899> and my water <WH4325>, my wool <WH6785> and my flax <WH6593>, mine oil <WH8081> and my drink <WH8250>.
¶ Therefore, behold, I will hedge <WH7753> up thy way <WH1870> with thorns <WH5518>, and make <WH1443> a wall <WH1447>, that she shall not find <WH4672> her paths <WH5410>.

And she shall follow <WH7291> after her lovers <WH157>, but she shall not overtake <WH5381> them; and she shall seek <WH1245> them, but shall not find <WH4672> them: then shall she say <WH559>, I will go <WH3212> and return <WH7725> to my first <WH7223> husband <WH376>; for then was it better <WH2896> with me than now <WH6258>.

For she did not know <WH3045> that I gave <WH5414> her corn <WH1715>, and wine <WH8492>, and oil <WH3323>, and multiplied <WH7235> her silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, which they prepared <WH6213> for Baal <WH1168>.

Therefore will I return <WH7725>, and take away <WH3947> my corn <WH1715> in the time <WH6256> thereof, and my wine <WH8492> in the season <WH4150> thereof, and will recover <WH5337> my wool <WH6785> and my flax <WH6593> given to cover <WH3680> her nakedness <WH6172>.
And now will I discover <WH1540> her lewdness <WH5040> in the sight <WH5869> of her lovers <WH157>, and none <WH376> shall deliver <WH5337> her out of mine hand <WH3027>.
I will also cause all her mirth <WH4885> to cease <WH7673>, her feast days <WH2282>, her new moons <WH2320>, and her sabbaths <WH7676>, and all her solemn feasts <WH4150>.

And I will destroy <WH8074> her vines <WH1612> and her fig trees <WH8384>, whereof she hath said <WH559>, These are my rewards <WH866> that my lovers <WH157> have given <WH5414> me: and I will make <WH7760> them a forest <WH3293>, and the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall eat <WH398> them.

And I will visit <WH6485> upon her the days <WH3117> of Baalim <WH1168>, wherein she burned incense <WH6999> to them, and she decked <WH5710> herself with her earrings <WH5141> and her jewels <WH2484>, and she went <WH3212> after <WH310> her lovers <WH157>, and forgat <WH7911> me, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>.
¶ Therefore, behold, I will allure <WH6601> her, and bring <WH3212> her into the wilderness <WH4057>, and speak <WH1696> comfortably <WH3820> unto her.

And I will give <WH5414> her her vineyards <WH3754> from thence, and the valley <WH6010> of Achor <WH5911> for a door <WH6607> of hope <WH8615>: and she shall sing <WH6030> there, as in the days <WH3117> of her youth <WH5271>, and as in the day <WH3117> when she came up <WH5927> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And it shall be at that day <WH3117>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, that thou shalt call <WH7121> me Ishi <WH376>; and shalt call <WH7121> me no more Baali <WH1180>.
For I will take away <WH5493> the names <WH8034> of Baalim <WH1168> out of her mouth <WH6310>, and they shall no more be remembered <WH2142> by their name <WH8034>.

And in that day <WH3117> will I make <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> for them with the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, and with the fowls <WH5775> of heaven <WH8064>, and with the creeping things <WH7431> of the ground <WH127>: and I will break <WH7665> the bow <WH7198> and the sword <WH2719> and the battle <WH4421> out of the earth <WH776>, and will make them to lie down <WH7901> safely <WH983>.

And I will betroth <WH781> thee unto me for ever <WH5769>; yea, I will betroth <WH781> thee unto me in righteousness <WH6664>, and in judgment <WH4941>, and in lovingkindness <WH2617>, and in mercies <WH7356>.
I will even betroth <WH781> thee unto me in faithfulness <WH530>: and thou shalt know <WH3045> the LORD <WH3068>.
And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, I will hear <WH6030>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, I will hear <WH6030> the heavens <WH8064>, and they shall hear <WH6030> the earth <WH776>;
And the earth <WH776> shall hear <WH6030> the corn <WH1715>, and the wine <WH8492>, and the oil <WH3323>; and they shall hear <WH6030> Jezreel <WH3157>.

And I will sow <WH2232> her unto me in the earth <WH776>; and I will have mercy <WH7355> upon her that had not obtained mercy <WH7355> <WH3818>; and I will say <WH559> to them which were not my people <WH5971>, Thou art my people <WH5971>; and they shall say <WH559>, Thou art my God <WH430>.
